ComicInfo.Title: Keep F*cking
ComicInfo.Summary:
Jesus takes the fight directly to Zeus and Isis, the two mythological gods leading a horde of desperate, worship-hungry deities! But do Jesus, Satan, and Sister Maria actually stand a chance? And can they keep their sh*t together long enough to stop the coming madness?
Back-up Feature:* Holy F*ck Origins: 506 AD + 1 BC*Release Dates:* Digital Edition - 2/18/2015Print Edition - 4/15/2015*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Daniël Arruda Massa | 1 | Var | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Daniël Arruda Massa | 2 | Var | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Daniël Arruda Massa | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-28 19:40:12. [CVDB480142]
ComicInfo.Characters: Anansi, Anubis, Ganesha, Garuda, Hercules, Isis, Jesus Christ, Merlin, Quetzalcoatl, Satan, Sister Maria, Virgin Mary, Zeus
